Package ohos.rpc

Provides the following classes for enabling communication between processes on the same device or on different devices:

  • IPCSkeleton: Provides IPC interfaces to obtain services, read and write objects, and obtain the UID and PID.
  • IRemoteBroker: Provides the holder of a remote proxy.
  • IRemoteObject: Provides interfaces to manage remote objects. This class must be inherited and implemented by both service providers and users.
  • IRemoteObject.DeathRecipient: Represents an inner class of IRemoteObject that subscribes to death notifications of a RemoteObject.
  • MessageOption: Provides an identifier used by the sendRequest interface to synchronously or asynchronously send MessageParcel messages.
  • MessageParcel: Provides the message data and inherits from the Parcel class.
  • RemoteException: Reports IPC exceptions and inherits from the Exception class.
  • RemoteObject: Implements and manages remote objects.
  • RemoteProxy: Implements and manages remote proxies.
  • RemoteObjectCallbackList: Manages the list of callbacks and automatically removes a callback from the list if the process hosting the callback dies.
  • ReliableFileDescriptor: Wraps reliable file descriptors that can be accessed from multiple threads.
Since:
1
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRemoteBroker
    Obtains the holder of a remote proxy object.
    IRemoteObject
    A remote object interface that must be implemented by service providers and users.
    IRemoteObject.DeathRecipient
    Represents an inner class of IRemoteObject that subscribes to death notifications of a RemoteObject.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IPCSkeleton
    Provides static interfaces in the IPC skeleton to obtain services, read and write objects, obtain the UID and PID, obtain the IDs of local and peer devices, and check whether an interface call is made on the same device.
    MessageOption
    Defines options for sending messages together with sendRequest.
    MessageParcel
    Inherits from the Parcel class and provides methods for managing MessageParcel objects.
    ReliableFileDescriptor
    Wraps a reliable FileDescriptor that can be accessed from multiple threads.
    ReliableFileDescriptor.AutoCloseFileInputStream
    Represents a file input stream whose file descriptor is automatically closed when this stream is closed.
    ReliableFileDescriptor.AutoCloseFileOutputStream
    Represents a file output stream whose file descriptor is automatically closed when this stream is closed.
    RemoteObject
    Implements remote objects.
    RemoteObjectCallbackList<E extends IRemoteBroker>
    Stores and maintains a list of remote callbacks from a service to its clients.
    RemoteProxy
    Implements IRemoteObject proxy objects.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RemoteException
    Represents the remote exception.
